text: This was an amazing find! Nice room with a beautiful view of Ella Rock.  It’s a short walk into Ella and if you follow the train track it only takes 10mins. Breakfast was fab and our hosts couldn’t do enough for us. Would definitely recommend this place.
title: Amazing Find

placeInfo: {'id': '12349588', 'name': 'Paraiso Guest House', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 82, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.869917, 'longitude': 81.0433, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d12349588-Reviews-Paraiso_Guest_House-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': None, 'address': 'Temple Road Kithalella, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Temple Road', 'street2': 'Kithalella', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 5, 'count4': 8, 'count5': 69}}
text: Thank you Dhana and his family for a wonderful start to out first visit to Sri Lanka. A simple but stunning accomodation with eveything you need. Parasio is situated in a peaceful area out of town but is only a short walk from town along the railway lines. The daily breakfast was incredible and the views, sensational. Dhana help us see and do all we had planned Ella (including train ride, hikes and tasty meals) and also assisted us with transport. We would definitely stay here again.
title: Serenity in Ella

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: Had a lovely stay at the mountain heavens resort as part of our tour of Sri Lanka! The team were so friendly and couldn’t do enough to help us. Special shout out to Ranjit for making our meals so enjoyable! He was so professional and kind! Rooms were lovely and comfortable. Pool area is great (even in the cloudy days) and the food was lovely and plentiful! extra thanks to the team (Shamika)  for arranging a special meal and cake for my friends birthday which was above and beyond our expectations!
title: Great place to stay and gorgeous view!

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: We had the most wonderful stay at Mountain Heavens. The setting is breathtaking and the staff were lovely and friendly. The room was excellent for the 4 of us. Lots of space and immaculately clean. I would definitely recommend this hotel and would love to return.
title: Breathtakingly beautiful

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
roomTip: Ask for super deluxe refurbished rooms and you might be okay
text:
Sri Lanka is wonderful. This hotel is not. The GM and his team deserve credit for listening to the numerous issues we had and trying to find solutions but the simple reality is that if you are staying in a non-refurbished room (basically anything on the left side of the hotel) then you are getting U.K. 2* quality for the price of 4*. 

Dirty sheets (fixed quickly), no water pressure on top floor so shower was unusable (moved to another room which was only marginally better), mould on bathroom blind, sewage smell in bathroom (attempt to mask it with an air freshener), stained and split bedroom blinds….

The view is unreal and the location brilliant (5 minute walk to the centre of Ella) but that’s where the good ends. 

Either all the reviewers giving 5* stayed in refurbished rooms or the view is clouding any sort of objective judgement….
title: Amazing views…appalling bedrooms

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
roomTip: Lots to see and do in Ella
text: This hotel exceeded our expectations. The views are incredible and our room and terrace were wonderful, spacious, clean, with a very comfortable bed. The staff were exceptional, so helpful with booking taxis and tuk tuks and sorting our laundry. Particular thanks to Shammika, the General Manager,  who went above and beyond. The food is very good and the views from the restaurant are fabulous. Breakfast deserves a special mention - the best we had on our trip. We would definitely recommend a stay here.
title: Exceeded expectations- a fabulous hotel with stunning views.

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: What to say about The Mountain Heavens… Firstly, the positive. This hotel has so much potential because of the vista from the rooms and the pool. Ella Gap is stunning with rolling hills into the distance. However… everything else about this hotel  barely gets a pass mark.  The rooms are large but basic, power went out daily. Internet did not work in the room multiple times. Staff are sometime friendly and sometime rude. Not a single female staff member. As for the restaurant, the less said the better. Breakfast was below anything we have had in Sri Lanka. No choices except what eggs style you would like. Atrocious coffee. Staff really just dumping everything down at once to get it over with. Dinner should be avoided all together with so many better options just down the road in Ella town. Serving the same dry white toast instead of bread rolls at dinner says it all. There is more competition opening around this hotel so I hope it drives some very large improvements as it could be an amazing hotel. The hotel website says ‘discover a hotel that defines a new dimension of luxury’…. Definitely not relative to other hotels in Sri Lanka.
title: Overrated and overpriced

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: It’s the first hotel in my trip who didn’t ask about review here and I want to write it with the biggest desire. My room was amazing, wonderful, comfortable, so fresh, cozy and best part of it is view from my balcony. The reception desk is so helpful and polite, I was glad to meet service like that. Thank you again that helped me with charger for phone. Of course restaurant was really nice. I enjoyed my breakfast 🤍 and I got attention and help from everyone there. These people can do their work, thank you for your service!

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: Overrated hotel. Rooms are big, setting is nice and swimming pool is lovely. But it is really too expensive for what you have. Staff is more functional than friendly, certainly compared to sri lankan standards. Maybe because there is no female staff in the hotel;-). We stayed in rooms 101 and 102 which are deluxe double rooms, but you cannot open the curtains to have the magnificent view on the valley and the mountains because it is situated on the lowest level where the swimming pool is. Everyone is passing by in the staircase which means that it is noisy. Price-quality is not good. You have hotels next doors which have the same view but much more charm and less expensive. And if the weather is bad, you do not need a swimming pool at all.
title: Overrated hotel.

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
roomTip: Walk rail track to Ella. Much quicker.
text: Lovely hotel with nice breakfast/lunch, bar. View is amazing from pool. Staff friendly and attentive. Massive bedrooms. Quickest way to walk into town is via rail track. A-lot  of stairs to get to rooms but that is no harm as breakfast is very hearty.
title: Beautiful views

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
roomTip: Good location for walking Ella's Rock
text: Wow what a view! The infinity pool really is the highlight of this hotel. The hotel seemed a little unloved but was being renovated during our stay. The hotel staff couldn't do enough for us to compensate for the disruption,  including complimentary food and drinks, which was very much appreciated.
title: Beautiful mountain views

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: This is a very nice Hotel. The rooms are big and very clean with lovely views. Unfortunately as we are in our late 70's we found the stairs a bit too much. There are four fairly steep flights from the car park to the swimming pool or groundfloor rooms. It is also a little way to the centre of town.
title: Lovely people, lovely room, lovely view and amazing Chef.

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text:
I could list and explain everything that is wrong and not right about this place.
In a nutshell:
Check in process was okay but not welcoming and warm. Some info about to hotel and rooms would have been appreciated. Front office staff and management not helpful in our request to move beds around in a suite, we had to call our agent to have this sorted since the hotel reception were not interested citing beds too heavy to move. It took more than 2 hours for the hotel manager to come to sort this out. Room was also leaking since it was raining when we moved into the room. Again, hotel slow to respond to come and mop up and least put a rug so we wouldn’t slip on a slippery floor. Wi-Fi was not working in the room, had to call reception, the reception staff told me “Not their problem it’s the service provider” so what is their problem then. I told the guy its certainly not my problem. A staff member (the room boy) came to look and played around with the box, still did not work. He said he would come back with another router but never did. But the Wi-Fi started working after he left so go figure. We were out the next day for the whole day, and they saw us leaving, when we got back the suite had not been dressed or cleaned, reception said because we did not hang up “Make our Room” sign up but I told them there was no such sign in the suite and it could not be found. English breakfast was poor and sausages were canned sausages, an insult to meaning “English Breakfast”. The bar closes early at 10pm but by 9:45pm they were clearing up switching lights off like an indication to us its “closing time” please leave!!!!!!!!!! We were on half board which was breakfast and dinner. The last night they tried to pull a fast one on us by saying we were only on B & B and that we should settle the dinner bill to which I said no and I had to contact our tour agent to sort out the manager was sitting close by and observing and did not even try to intervene, he knew what he was trying to do. Our tour agent sorted it and the next morning on checking out nothing came up about paying for dinner. The bathroom shower is badly designed and its supposed to be an open shower with no separation or door glass and water just went everywhere in the bathroom.
The only thing worthwhile at this hotel is the view on the valley going down and the surrounding mountains. I would not stay here again or recommend it especially for the high price we were paying slightly less than a 5-star hotel that we stayed in. I would rate this hotel at max 2 stars, the reception staff and manager are not very customer orientated and accommodating and it would appear that small requests bother them and the easiest answer for them is simply “NO”. When you are in such a business like Tourism accommodation and catering you have to be more appeasing to your clients or at least try to be so.
title: Nightmare and Disaster.

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text:
We had an excellent experience with Mountain Heavens.
Size of the rooms huge.
Clean and friendly staff.
Mithun who served breakfast was a great guy with friendly service.
title: Mesmerizing service

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
roomTip: Hope for a room with a view of Ella Gap.
text: Walking into the hotel gave a fantastic view of Ella Gap right in front of you. We had a wonderful room with the same view. Great staff and good food. Road uo to hotel is a steep single track. We walked down into Ella and got a tuk tuk back. A special place to stay.
title: Wonderful view of Ella Gap

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
roomTip: If you have mobility issues be aware there are a lot of stairs and request a room at the top to limit the stairs
text: The location is truly spectacular.  The rooms are spacious, comfortable with an outside terrace to admire the views.  The staff are friendly and helpful.  It is quiet and peaceful but close to town albeit up a very steep road with few passing places so a fun challenge for our driver!
title: Good hotel with spectacular views.

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: Friendly staff, comfortable room, gorgeous views from  the whole property. Enjoyable food and drinks and the Sri Lankan breakfast is great. Convenient location - a short walk down to Ella township makes this an ideal place to base your stay be in Ella.
title: Room with a view

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: Our fourth stop on our tour of Sri Lanka. This hotel offers an amazing experience with superb views down into the Ella Gap. Without doubt it provided us with one of the abiding memories of our trip. Large, comfortable room with a huge balcony looking down onto the infinity pool and valley beyond. Enjoying our first evening meal there was one to remember as the restaurant is open-sided and that night damp mist swirled around the place. Efficient and attentive staff and good choice of food (and wine - often not available in other hotels). Car access from Ella is via a steep single track road with very few adequate passing places. As our guide remarked, not an easy start to any stay here - the hotel probably needs to do something to address this problem.
title: Superb views!

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text:
Wonderful views and large comfortable rooms that take full advantage of the views.
Road Access to the hotel is difficult. If you have any sort of difficulty with stairs this is not the place to stay.
We had eighty steps to navigate to get to our room.
Buddika at reception was helpful and did his best to accommodate our needs.The staff were excellent.
title: Heavenly Outlook

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text:
Everything about this hotel made us go "wow"! Not just the absolutely fantastic view over the valley below, but also the super large room with very comfy bed, enormous balcony with seating and small table, and fabulous food (breakfast and evening meals) with great service in the restaurant.

As others have mentioned, the hotel is up a very steep, long and meandering, hill which we chose not to walk but tuk tuks are cheap and easily 'fly' up and down for access to the main street in Ella.

If there is a slight niggle, it is that the shower/wet-room floor can get very slippery when using the shower... and I managed to walk straight into one of the glass doors that are (normally) open to the patio! So just take heed...
title: Fabulous room with enormous balcony and a view to die for

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
roomTip:
The pool man did a fantastic job cleaning around the edge each morning to remove
the scum. Just gaze at the veiw while swimming.
text:
The View from this hotel sells it, its FABULOUS and the food is  good too.
Rooms were clean and a good size, we found the bed comfortable however each time one of us turned over in the night it sounded like it was going to collapse!
Overall a great place to stay especially for that wonderful view.
title: Fabulous Veiws...

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text:
We stayed 2 nights in The Mountain Heavens in our trip to Sri Lanka. Hotel is about 5 minute drive from the main strip of shops. Road to the hotel is extremely narrow and steep. if you are FIT you can walk to the town area from the hotel.

Staff were pleasant and the check-in was smooth. This little boutique hotel was built on an edge of a mountain. Therefore, got killer views wherever you go including the pool, rooms and the restaurant.

Our room and the bathroom was huge. We had a pretty spacious balcony overlooking the valley with a small table and chairs. Airconditioning was great and boy we were grateful for it.

Room was clean and neat. However, you can see the hotel has aged a bit. Grout has come off the tiles in certain areas. Wooden panelling behind the tv was split in half. If you want a modern 5 star room this isn't the place. Saying that room is still comfortable enough.

we found the Sri Lankan food in the restaurant was fabulous. I highly recommend to try the rice and curry. so much better than the restaurants in Ella town.
title: Remarkable views of the valley

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: The Mountain Heavens provide a splendid view on the Ella Gap. The view is stunning. To get the magnificent view you need to request for the rooms with the best view on Ella gap. The food they provided was also very enjoyable. The cooking is great with a 5 course meal.
title: Breath taking views at Ella

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
roomTip: The hotel has steep steps, access would be difficult for those who have difficulty walking and not suitable for those in wheelchairs.
text:
We stayed at Mountain Heavens for 3 nights and really enjoyed our stay. 

We arrived after 6pm to a cool towel and welcome drink.  We were shown to our room and given help with our bags.  Our room was a deluxe with a large private terrace, with incredible views!  The hotel staff pointed out that the terrace was perfect to watch the sunrise, and they were right!

The room was adequate and very specious.  The room did seem a bit dated compared to other Sri Lankan hotels we stayed in, but it was perfectly fine.   

We received toiletries, daily fresh water bottles, hairdryer, clean soft towels and a comfortable large bed.  The room also had a safety box in the room. 

On the first night we ate in the restaurant, both opting for Sri Lankan dishes and they were delicious. The service was excellent and our server was very attentive.  Prices were really reasonable also. 

Breakfast each day was lovely.  We received fresh fruit, breads, coffee, juice and eggs. We opted for omelette with added bacon. 

The hotel pool was refreshing on hot days, although we only used it twice for a couple of hours late afternoon.  Sun loungers are limited, as it’s a small pool area but we were able to obtain some on both days. 

The hotel is known for its views and this means it’s not easily accessible, unless you want to hike up a hill.   On an evening the road / track to the hotel isn’t well lit so we opted for a  500 rupee Tuk Tuk back each night.   

Walking down to the main Ella road is fine, just take flat shoes!!
Within 5/8 mins you are at the main spot in Ella with loads of bars and restaurants.  The hotel is the perfect base to explore Ella and the surrounding sights. 

This hotel was recommended to us, however booking sites were showing no availability.  Upon contacting the hotel directly, they secured us a room.  Communication via email was prompt and professional.

We really enjoyed our stay. I booked the hotel for the views and the pool, both did not disappoint.  We would highly recommend this hotel and would not hesitate to return ourselves.
title: Lovely hotel with amazing views

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
roomTip: Try and get the room directly below the restaurant - it has a huge terrace with amazing views and not much noise from above.
text: My wife and I stayed here for two nights and loved every minute- so ignore the negative reviews you may have seen recently.  Very attentive/helpful staff- especially on reception. We found the food excellent whether at breakfast or dinner. Cocktails really lovely- especially at happy hour and views over Ella Gap were superb. Our room was spotlessly clean, no sign of any ants as suggested by a previous reviewer who seems to have gotten out of bed from the wrong side! You do need a tuk tuk if you’re planning on going down into Ella, but as this only costs 500 rupees ( £1.20)-  this is no big issue. My wife and I also were able to do a yoga session down the road from the hotel at Zion View and our hotel even accommodated our request for breakfast after the usual finishing time. Loved the views, loved our room, loved the staff and loved the food & drink.
title: Really lovely Hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: Amazing views from anywhere in the hotel. Clean and very comfortable rooms, the pool is amazing during the day and in the night. Staff members are very nice and provided guidance on tourist spots and hikes. Food is amazing, especially traditional sri lanka food.
title: 3 days 2 night at this heavenly hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
roomTip: Food in the town better and cheaper but requires tuktuk.
text:
Hotel that tries but fails in so many ways, but keeps its rating based on the view, which is fantastic. 
Good room, BUT, beds have waterproof sheets so you wake up stuck to them , ants in the bathroom, mucky gaps between the tiles, and slippery shower floor with no non slip mats, and an air con system that seemed to have a will of it’s own and switched off every now and then! 
Chef tried really hard, but most foods over seasoned massively, and accompanied by white plastic bread served as toast. On a half board deal and have rarely eaten so  little.
Suffers from shortage of staff, and if the cricket is on the the dining room, don’t expect the waiters to stir from the tv often to serve you. 
Hotel is perched on top of a mountain and is full of stairs inside with NO lift. Getting back up there requires a tuktuk at least from the town.
Swimming pool has a nasty greasy black bring round it.
title: Terrific view but little else to impress.

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: Extremely clean, modern hotel with a stunning view! The way they serve breakfast (and food generally) is just epic! It was the pleasure to spend my birthday in such a lovely place. Hotel's crew is totally dedicated to the guests. I would like to thank you once again for my birthday dinner and specially baked cake!! I definitely recommend to friends and I will be returning in the future.
title: True heaven in Ella, Sri Lanka

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text:
We stayed here for 1 night whilst in Ella. It was our least favourite hotel in our 2 week trip to Sri Lanka.
The room wasn't that clean. There was a single mattress next to our double bed which wasn't made up properly and yellow stains were on show. The coasters had dirt in them.

It felt like a very budget hotel in a beautiful location. Essentially the price is for the view which is truly beautiful, however you could just hike to a view point to to capture the view and not pay so much to stay where you can have this nice view. 

Breakfast was included. The food was nice however I was brought eggs with meat on having ordered a vegetarian option. The waiter was apologetic and after around 10 minutes brought me a new plate of eggs. Whilst eating the eggs I started to taste bacon and then found a piece of bacon on the eggs. My impression is that the bacon had been laid ontop and then taken off again when the kitchen realised they got my order wrong for a 2nd time. I didn't eat any more of the eggs in view of this and we didn't have enough time to ask for another plate. 
If I had a food allergy I would not trust this kitchen to be careful based on this experience I had. 

All the staff we spoke with were very friendly and kind. I don't usually write negative reviews but I wasn't impressed with this hotel and wish we had saved our money and stayed elsewhere.
title: You pay for the view

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text:
Mountain Heavens literally exceeded my expectations! Everything about this place was just perfect. From staff to location to vibes and energy. I wouldn’t recommend another place! Thank you TMH! 
Also, SKY FULL OF STARS AT NIGHT!!!!!!!!!
title: Heaven on Earth!

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: The view is amazing and the rooms are very comfortable. The room was big and we were very happy to be in this hotel. Buddika made our stay very nice. Unfortunately we only stayed 1 night and that wasn’t enough. Hope we can come back anytime. Thank you!
title: One night in Mountain Heavens Ella

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: Epic location. Although probably 1.0km from Ella high st, it's only LKR 500 each way by tuktuk. The hotel is very close to the railway line (not intrusive) giving easy walking access along the track to the start of the Ella Rock 'hike' (walking on the track is officially prohibited but everyone does it). Great, friendly service. Restaurant very good all round with a good selection of international and local cuisine. Our room was top floor with a small balcony. Very clean and spacious. Views are totally epic
title: Amazing views and friendly service

placeInfo: {'id': '1222213', 'name': 'The Mountain Heavens', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.871151, 'longitude': 81.04603, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1222213-Reviews-The_Mountain_Heavens-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.mountainheavensella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 25, 'count2': 41, 'count3': 98, 'count4': 316, 'count5': 478}}
text: 10/10 the best view I’ve ever had. Nice big rooms, very comfortable bed and pillow. The staff are very friendly and helpful especially Shammika. Excellent location. Great experience. I definitely recommend to friends and I will be returning in the future
title: 10/10 loved it.

placeInfo: {'id': '4465330', 'name': 'Ella Jungle Resort', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 798, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.828174, 'longitude': 81.086365, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d4465330-Reviews-Ella_Jungle_Resort-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.ellajungleresort.lk/', 'address': '10th Mile Post, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10th Mile Post', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 68, 'count2': 44, 'count3': 64, 'count4': 145, 'count5': 477}}
text:
Well, no.   Big no. 
First of all, before booking, please go through all these comments. Look at the pictures. Not posted by the property but from guest. The place have a great potential but as of today it is just a scam. Place is undeveloped, rooms are nasty. Food terrible. All three above aspects can be fixed easily and reading that this "in a jungle" makes no sense. We travel to Sri Lanka often, staying in boutique hotels but also in a real jungle. All places can be clean and nice disputing the fact of not easy environment around. Same w/ food. Staying "in a jungle" explain nasty food served? Having so many option for low-key or upscale Sri Lanka' culinary possibilities? 

So we did claim many times issues on site. Zero interest. Management's reaction: it is what it is, deal with it. 
Immediate decision to leave. After one night in dirty room and without even touching a breakfast. 

Now it gets more interesting.. When I wanted to set a review on booking.com it turned that ... we have not stayed there. Ella Jungle Resort just canceled our stay, after the payment was taken. Now I understand the GM laugh on the phone and the answer "good luck with the reviews, hahahah". 

This is so fUp that such terribly managed places w/ the attitude as they have presented, in such beautiful country are making trips for tourists so unpleasant. I love Sri Lanka. We'll be back regardless. But I hope bs spots will despair from the accommodation map sooner than later.

Random pictures and management actions (then and now) should say more than this entire review.
title: Terrible experience. Waste of time, money and nerves. Stay away.

placeInfo: {'id': '4465330', 'name': 'Ella Jungle Resort', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 798, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.828174, 'longitude': 81.086365, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d4465330-Reviews-Ella_Jungle_Resort-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.ellajungleresort.lk/', 'address': '10th Mile Post, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10th Mile Post', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 68, 'count2': 44, 'count3': 64, 'count4': 145, 'count5': 477}}
text:
I don't why there are negative reviews. it's a jungle resort and it lived to its expectations. you can't be staying in a luxury property in middle of jungle. arrival experience is amazing. adventure starts right from there. room is spacious and clean. view from balcony to stream is next to amazing. Best thing is the staff they treats you like king and makes you feel very special. very friendly and always ready to do whatever you ask. no is something I didn't hear.

my 9 year old son enjoyed the activities also and last bath at river stream is most rejenuvating in our entire srilankan trip.

the chef you received us on arrival and isuru at reception were great. no doubt everyone else is equally good.

don't go by negative reviews. if you can walk and climb and need a different experience for your kids take then here. they will enjoy.
title: Must visit when in Ella

placeInfo: {'id': '4465330', 'name': 'Ella Jungle Resort', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 798, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.828174, 'longitude': 81.086365, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d4465330-Reviews-Ella_Jungle_Resort-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.ellajungleresort.lk/', 'address': '10th Mile Post, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10th Mile Post', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 68, 'count2': 44, 'count3': 64, 'count4': 145, 'count5': 477}}
text:
I am writing this with great frustration. 
Ella jungle resort gave us and everyone present the worst possible experience. 
First of all the location and the nature is very beautiful. I am sad to say it’s in wrong hands. On arrival the room condition was very bad. 
1. Toilet comods not cleaned 
2. Ant infestation everywhere 
3. No water supply 
4. Definitely no hot water 
5. No AC to all the rooms 
6. Towels wet 

Anyways we somehow managed and tried take a wash with the little water we got and go have dinner. 
At this point, we were super hungry following the tiring ride to the resort from the main road. 
But most of the items were over or almost over. Initially there was a few devilled chicken left. Once asked to restock it they brought devilled prawns and not chicken ( that also after a very long time) for a meat dish it was only the devilled prawns after that. For people with seafood allergy just eat the rice only?  because other dishes were also empty.  There was ice cream but no bowls to eat. 
Plates, cutleries, cups were not washed properly and there is no one at the buffet to check and restock the finishing plates, cutleries and food. No one nearby area to call also. Under the plates full of oil and noodle pieces on top of the plate  as they were not washed properly. 
We had to go to the buffet and keep on standing until we got something to eat. When we got something to eat we had to then stand waiting for plates. 

Since we had to experience this at the start we already made a complaint through whatsapp to the one who was taking the bookings. So that they will correct themselves and the next breakfast , lunch and the next day will be treated properly for the price we paid to get the so called 3 star hotel experience as mentioned by them. 
The reply I got from the operator was… “NOT allowed to have bites in buffet” 
So, i said yea no need to have bites in buffet if we can have dinner that’s enough. 
So the hotel team has informed her that some people are having bites from the buffet that is why this whole problem raised.
She never apologised or corrected the issue. 
Some other person not having bites is not the solution for all the problems I mentioned above. Even if they had bites, there is a limit a person can eat and for the money they took they are responsible enough to provide us with enough food specially when we were away from the main road. 
The full amount was already paid to confirm the booking. 
As all the guests couldn’t bear the frustration they tried to talk to the two so called managers called Isuru and Ajith. 
They too never apologised or tried to correct themselves. They are saying that the problem is this going under the name as hotel. This should be an adventure zone it seems. If this is an adventure zone, they cannot be charging such high prices and even if this is an adventure zone they cannot keep the guests starving like how we did for the dinner. Ajith is also saying that for one day become vegetarian and enjoy. If you expect the guests to eat vegetarian for the price they paid please add more vegetarian dishes without letting them eat only rice. 
Mr. Ajith’s behaviour is definitely not suitable for a manager over there. He doesn’t know how to behave. He is always trying to rule the guests and try to be the boss like an army commander over there. May be because the owner of the place is a commander? Under the term of hotel hospitality you cannot rule the guests and talk to them in rough tone and command them over things. The isuru the other manager is saying he will send all the staff home tomorrow because the issue to this problem is the innocent ground staff. 
From what I heard soon after an incident like this happens what they do is chase away the ground staff without even paying them their salary as if they are responsible for what happened. Yes the staff over there is not skilled enough for a three star resort. If you charge such amounts and advertise your business in such a way please also spend appropriately to give the best possible service, food and experience for the guests without being only profit oriented. Upon departure we had to wait for hours sleeping on the lobby until the cable car + jeep took us to the main road. They didn’t even let us stay on the room until their lorry is ready. On arrival we got a safari jeep but for departure we got a lorry. 
They do so much cost cutting here. 
They do not think about the time and value of it on guests. We had to leave with so much frustration and hunger. Soon after leaving the first thing we did was to go to the most nearest pol roti shop and eat. Where we got so tasty food and our stomaches got full. For everything I have mentioned I have evidence from screenshots, recordings and video clips. I hope they correct themselves because the nature over there is nice. 
But, I have also experienced similarly or even better more beautiful natural places for a lower budget and with great food and service. First of all the owner of this place should correct himself. I hope Ella Jungle Resort will soon correct themselves from cheating the guests. For everyone who is planning to go there, please think twice.
title: Frustrated

placeInfo: {'id': '4465330', 'name': 'Ella Jungle Resort', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 798, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.828174, 'longitude': 81.086365, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d4465330-Reviews-Ella_Jungle_Resort-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.ellajungleresort.lk/', 'address': '10th Mile Post, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10th Mile Post', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 68, 'count2': 44, 'count3': 64, 'count4': 145, 'count5': 477}}
text:
Disappointing Experience Despite Great Location

Our recent stay at this hotel was extremely disappointing, despite its fantastic location. The initial impression was positive, especially with the cable car experience, but everything went downhill once we entered our room.

Upon arrival, we found two used towels on the bed, which was quite unsettling. We requested fresh towels, but even then, there was no hot water available, making it impossible to enjoy a warm shower in the freezing cold. To add to our frustration, the room lacked basic amenities such as tissues—there was only an empty tissue box.

The cleanliness of the room was another major issue. The bed was covered in dirt and dead ants, forcing us to do our own housekeeping. This is simply unacceptable. To top it all off, dinner was terrible, making the entire experience even more regrettable.

It’s clear that the staff responsible for maintaining the property are not taking their duties seriously. This lack of responsibility and attention to detail left us with a negative impression of what could have been a great stay.
title: Disappointing Experience Despite Great Location

placeInfo: {'id': '4465330', 'name': 'Ella Jungle Resort', 'rating': 4, 'numberOfReviews': 798, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.828174, 'longitude': 81.086365, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d4465330-Reviews-Ella_Jungle_Resort-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.ellajungleresort.lk/', 'address': '10th Mile Post, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10th Mile Post', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 68, 'count2': 44, 'count3': 64, 'count4': 145, 'count5': 477}}
text:
I believed in all the fancy things they boasted and posted on their Instagram and reserved this place for B&B on April 12th/13th days. In spite of the new year, they still accepted my booking at the same ongoing rate (50,000/= B&B).
During our journey we didn’t get single follow-up call from them to check whether we were safely on the way, that shows how less they care us. After reaching their Café at the bend Restaurant, we tried calling the resort contact Gayan to say that we have come, but he didn’t answer the phone ontime. So we went around the café to see if there is a security officer to inform that we have reached, but the Security Officer seated inside the café and he was deaf, his hearing was so bad and we had to speak too loud so that he would hear and understand what we say. And he wasn’t a presentable, attentive, supportive and vigilant security officer. 
This shows how negligent and careless they are about their security despite the fact the owner of the Resort being a retired Major in the SL ARMY. 
We had to wait for an hour for their Toyota Hi-lux truck to come and pick us to the resort. It was raining, and the truck’s condition was very bad, its roof was damaged and had holes. 
After we reached, we were given a welcome drink, since we personally had some health concern over certain food we consume, we inquired about the ingredients of the fruit drink. The waiter didn’t know what he served us nor did he want to ask the Chef. 
We were escorted to our room, and we came to know there was no hot water shower. Being  located in a cool climate area. So we had to have a shower in the freezing cold water. During the whole night there were power drops, we were in the dark many times, they didn’t have a generator. 
We order dinner from the a la carte menu in 3hrs in advance, but the food came only around 10pm. They gave an excuse saying they were short of staff due to sinhala  new year. But why do they undertake bookings then ? if they are unable to serve food or provide service on time ? 
When we woke up next morning, we realized there was no water in the tap.  We couldn’t use the toilet and we had no way of pooping or urinating.  The management didn’t know that the guests didn’t have water. We tried to call them, but their phone was switched off, so we had to come out of our room and walk all the way to the front reception area looking for a person to complain. So we disappointedly returned back to our room and walked down to the water stream near the resort (Kirindi Oya) and bathed and peed as well in the stream. Such a gross, unpleasant experience ever faced in life in my whole travel life. Then few hours later manager came and said tap is broken, no maintenance staff, they are getting water from the stream, som mud stuck in the T-joint blah blah. So we had to believe whatever he said. We were served a so called English type but very basic breakfast for the price we paid, two slices of toasted white bread, 4 tiny sausages , magarine and jam and omelet with spinach. No Coffee, No Tea, No fruit platter, No brown bread, no meat…They didn’t serve us water, but they had mineral water bottles, the glasses were full of ants. 
We finished our breakfast around 10am, and was going to check-out, Then we realized their cable car was not working due to some mechanical or electrical issue in the tractor engine they use to operate the cables. There was no mechanic to fix it, finally an old person called to be the Chairman of this resort came there 1hr later and he was trying all his skill to fix it. Fire sparks were coming out of the battery terminals and the engine of the cable car machine. Being a mechanic I was 100% sure it has not gone through regular maintenance of battery check-up. They didn’t even have a tool kit to diagnose the issue. While we were waiting for more than 1.5hrs, a retired major guy came tried to lame attempt to pacify us by giving a 150/= 2 FANTA bottles to pacify our frustration. But we rejected it saying we need to check-out ASAP. As were already wasted our money, time and energy which was worth more than 150rupees, and was very late for our next appointment while we were filled with anger and frustration.  
Cable car didn’t seem to be working, we were scared even if it starts working what would happen if  it suddenly stops in the middle in the air while on travel. So we decided to carry all our heavy bags o the shoulders walked on the shaky wooden bridge with great difficulty by balancing our body with fear of our lives and crossed stream to the other side of the land. The walk wasn’t difficult to get to the top, we lost our way, and it was the most terrible unpleasant experience we faced with carrying heavy bags in our shoulders. We had no assurance that there would be a lorry waiting to take us back to the road as the Toyota Hilux what they use had gone to wellawaya town for some other work. So the resort people had to bring a lorry from outside to take us back to the road where our vehicles were parked near the ”Café at the Bend”.. 

MOST TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE,  PLEASE DO NOT BOOK THIS PLACE. 
Management isn’t paying any attention to the guests or the facilities of the resort. Management doesn’t know the problems of the guests, management doesn’t look after the maintenance..
title: The best way to waste 50,000/= and Fuel by driving 6hrs & 200km from Colombo to Ella DON’T GO!

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
text:
The most scenic, idyllic location! Luxurious and spacious rooms. Nice little pool, badminton court, swing and lovely gardens. We stayed in the family room which was very comfortable. 

The staff went out of their way to make us happy. Thank you Senerath, Jagath, Gunawardena, Kumara, Bhanuka and Chef! Hoping to visit again!!
title: Luxurious stay in picturesque location!

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
text: If you love stunning views, nature, outstanding service, huge rooms and a relaxing space then this is the correct location for you. The staff is super friendly! You will enjoy their company and they will take the time to talk to you. This is one of the most amazing mountain views that I have ever seen. It also feels like having your own appartment. The rooms are HUGE. There is some wildlife to find and a natural garden.  We only stayed a few days since we were on a round-trip, but we would have loved to stay longer. We would like to come back and see it again and we recommend it to everyone who simply needs to relax. There are not any surrounding noise from cities or similar disturbances.
title: Stunning mountain view and service. Huge rooms

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
text:
We had a very enjoyable stay at the planters bungalow with our close family altogether a group of 15 including 5 grandchildren. 
Great rooms with beautiful views of the mountains  etc. Very helpful staff. Senarath the manager was very good from the time of booking upto our stay. Food was lovely. Staff were very accommodating to our requests. Even organised a birthday cake/ decorations!
title: Fully recommend. Lovely bungalow.

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
text: A short drive from Ella town, Planter’s Bungalow has a homely vibe set in paradise. The views took our breath away. Sitting at the restaurant and watching the sun go down over the mountains will be a cherished memory forever. The food then lived up to the setting! It was one of our favourite meals from the whole holiday. All the staff were friendly and keen to make sure we were happy.
title: A must!

This place is an absolute gem! Nicely nestled away in beautiful surroundings. It was perfect and great value for money. The hotel manager did a sterling job  we always felt looked after. 

Great job guys. 

I'll definitely be coming here again!!
