placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
roomTip: Try the local dishes with freshly sourced ingredients.
text: A lovely collection of old colonial style bungalows with a modern twist. The view from the balcony overlooking the hillside jungle/forest/plantation at dawn and at sunset is simply breathtaking. The food is authentic and very tasty-I would recommend the Sri Lankan options made with fresh locally sourced ingredients. The manager Jagath couldn’t do enough for us to help make our visit happy and comfortable. Highly recommended!
title: Breathtaking views & excellent service

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
text: Fantastic hotel! Rooms, food, pool, garden and magnificent views 🫶 staff was very attentive and kind, even with our late arrival!  We enjoyed a super breakfast with the best view ever after we were woken by playing monkeys and the most stunning woodpeckers.
title: A beautiful gem in Ella

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
roomTip: We went end June and it was beautiful & lush!
text:
We loved our stay here. We had read about it being a little run down, which it is, yet the positives outshone for us! 
1. The room with full glass windows overlooking the lush first valley ahead is too good. The rooms were very spacious and very clean. The balcony has priceless views!
2. The staff was very friendly and extremely polite. We intended to go early for our walk, so they arranged breakfast super early only for us. I remember the person saying “madam it’s your home, just let us know when do you want”. Thank you for your kind attention. Kudos to the staff! 
3. The bathroom has all amenities and again super large!
4. The breakfast outdoor overlooking the valley is superb! The food itself is plentiful and served beautifully! 
The pool area is lovely too. 

HIGHLY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
title: SUPER views, EXCELLENT staff!!

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
text: Lovely place. The views from both the breakfast/pool areas and from the room were amazing, with ability to watch the sunrise straight from the bed. The service was good, nothing to complain about. Temperature and weather was stable and good at this time, with potential for some rain during the day.
title: Amazing view and lovely atmosphere

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
text:
Firstly, the positives - the balcony & view was amazing. The staff, mainly young boys were very polite. Breakfast was really good ( coconut roti was the best! ). 
This place could be amazing but unfortunately it’s not being looked after & is really dirty  - everything needs a deep clean.

 The bathroom in particular was really grotty with built up scum on shower walls & sinks.  This was not just few days or eve months of build up,I’d say years. The toilet was badly stained, which could be removed with some cream cleanser or bicarbonate of soda. Same with the sinks, the ceramic has no shine due to te build up of scum.  The cleaners seemed to have a spray but something more powerful is required.
 There was broken sunbeds lying outside our room - why not get rid of them. The look like they’ve been there forever. 
Given the price we paid £300 ( plus £25 bank charges as they insisted on deposit by bacs) for 2 nights, we expected at the very least a clean room. We raised our concerns with the manager when we left but the fact the room has been allowed to get this bad is beyond me. 

I’m sorry but cannot recommend this hotel.
title: Has potential to be amazing but very disappointing

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
text:
We were at the planters bungalow for 2 nights but would have loved to stay longer. The whole hotel area is so beautiful and full of pretty flowers and plants. The room was also very pretty and clean. The breakfast and dinner were delicious and the setting where you eat was so  quiet and peaceful. You could observe lots of animals in the trees.
We enjoyed the pool area and discovered the waterfalls in the area around the Hotel. One day we rented Scooters from the Hotel for about 15 dollars and drove to the Diyaluma waterfalls which was great fun.
The planters bungalow was the hotel with the best price/money ratio in our opinion and I can 100% recomment it!
title: Best hotel for a fair price

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
text: I spent 3 nights, mid way into my Sri Lanka stay, at this little piece of 'heaven', high up in the beautiful hill country near Ella. Both food and service were excellent, and the manager - Jagath - more than helpful with advice and arrangements for making the most of my time there. Rooms are split between the original Planters Bungalow and 2 small newer blocks, each housing 4 rooms, built into the hillside. It was in one of these where I stayed, and the views were magnificent - most memorably the sights and sounds of nature during the early morning sunrise. Thank you, and I should one day love to return.
title: A wonderful stay in hillside heaven!

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
text: A beautiful place to stay with amazing views of the hills and mountains. The rooms were very comfortable with spectacular views. The staff were wonderful. So friendly and attentive. The food was great. Couldn’t fault it. It is a little way from Ella but that suited us as it was so peaceful. Thanks to all the staff for a wonderful experience.
title: Peaceful hotel with spectacular views

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
roomTip: You need to order your food well in advance, to avoid long delays.
text: A tranquil, beautiful place with spectacular views. Large comfortable rooms with balconies facing out over the valley below. The views are spectacular and the cries of peacocks fill the air. The enchanting and extensive grounds are full of gorgeous trees and flowers, and further down, the herb, spice and vegetable gardens provide ingredients for the freshly cooked meals. At night, we would sit over dinner watching the fireflies dance through the trees. The staff were friendly and helpful. It is difficult to tear yourself away from the beauty of the place but we found some interesting, off the beaten track, places to visit - notably, Buduruwagala rock carvings, boasting the second largest Buddha carving in Sri Lanka - and where you can also take a peaceful boat trip across the lake, with its varied bird life. I would definitely recommend popping into Sam’s Cafe - a lovely little cafe on the river, with a charismatic manager who made us refreshing milkshakes and arranged the boat trip for us. Would highly recommend Planter’s Bungalow if you are looking for peace and quiet, away from the busy Ella town centre.
title: Balm for the soul

placeInfo: {'id': '1987773', 'name': 'Ella Planters Bungalow', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 502, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.830848, 'longitude': 81.07641, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1987773-Reviews-Ella_Planters_Bungalow-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.plantersbungalow.com', 'address': '10 Mile Post Karandagolla, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '10 Mile Post', 'street2': 'Karandagolla', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 7, 'count2': 12, 'count3': 49, 'count4': 100, 'count5': 334}}
text: Super tasty breakfast. The location is a bit outside of ella with beautiful views and well maintained bungalows and main house. Well managed by locals and the local staff went the extra mile to accomodste our special requets and made our stay a besutiful, relaxing experience.
title: Extraordinary staff at a beautiful location

placeInfo: {'id': '1236751', 'name': 'Zion View Ella Green Retreat', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.87216, 'longitude': 81.04709, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1236751-Reviews-Zion_View_Ella_Green_Retreat-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.zionviewella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 21, 'count2': 32, 'count3': 83, 'count4': 239, 'count5': 583}}
text: Zion is a bit off the beaten path, which we really appreciated—it was peaceful and allowed us to get a great night’s sleep. The location offers breathtaking views, and breakfast on the terrace was a lovely experience. I would definitely come back to this place again.
title: Peaceful Escape with Stunning Views and Charming Terrace Breakfast

roomTip: You have to climb and defend many steps
text: An excellent place to relax. You have to climb a hill to the hotel and then then go down many steps. The view is super. The young person at the desk was extremely helpful and very accommodating. The rooms are super with good view of the mountains. The food was good. Very kid friendly. No TV which was just great

placeInfo: {'id': '1236751', 'name': 'Zion View Ella Green Retreat', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.87216, 'longitude': 81.04709, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1236751-Reviews-Zion_View_Ella_Green_Retreat-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.zionviewella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 21, 'count2': 32, 'count3': 83, 'count4': 239, 'count5': 583}}
text: We throughly enjoyed our stay at the Zion and wished we had booked a longer visit here. We booked direct on the websites homepage which was easy and secure. Balance paid when we arrived. I emailed a few questions before our journey and they always replied with helpful advice. The rooms are basic yet comfortable with the most amazing views especially when lounging in the hammock. The food is fantastic. Breakfast selection is plentiful with freshly prepared hot choices and cold selections. Evening meals are delicious and again a very good selection. You won’t go hungry here. I did a wonderful yoga class (with a wow factor view) one of the mornings, if we had been here longer I would have definitely done more. Great instructor. The morning of departure reception arranged a complementary drop off to the train station. The Zion is a few minutes walk up hill where you are rewarded with those views. We never did but if you don’t fancy the walk there are plenty of TukTuks around which will be happy to drive you up. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful, they really can’t do enough to make your stay comfortable. During our tour of Sri Lanka we stayed in 4 & 5 star hotels too and the Zion was definitely one our highlights. Thank you. Namaste
title: Breath taking views and amazing food.

text: We made a direct booking through the Zion View homepage, the process was simple and secure. Stayed for two nights in two lovely clean adjacent rooms with aircon/fans/nets and woke up in the morning to the most fantastic view from our balcony overlooking Ella Gap. The staff team were super helpful throughout and the location, which is up a short lane from the centre of Ella is perfect. Thank Zion View Team for a lovely stay.

placeInfo: {'id': '1236751', 'name': 'Zion View Ella Green Retreat', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.87216, 'longitude': 81.04709, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1236751-Reviews-Zion_View_Ella_Green_Retreat-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.zionviewella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 21, 'count2': 32, 'count3': 83, 'count4': 239, 'count5': 583}}
text: We stayed for 3 nights at the gorgeous Zion View. The Mountain View room with a hammock on the balcony was amazing. Even though it rained a couple of times while we were there it was still so nice to lounge on the hammock and take in the beautiful mist view. We had breakfast included and there was a huge selection of fruit, pastries, freshly made waffles etc which was all delicious. It’s a very short but steep climb up to Zion View from the main road and the Tuk Tuk’s can struggle a bit so best to walk if you can. The hotel manager was super helpful and we booked massages whilst there which were some of the best we’ve had (best in SL anyway!) plenty to do in the area - highlight for me was walking along the train track to the 9 arch bridge. You will have a wonderful time at Zion View.
title: Magical stay in Ella

placeInfo: {'id': '1236751', 'name': 'Zion View Ella Green Retreat', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.87216, 'longitude': 81.04709, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1236751-Reviews-Zion_View_Ella_Green_Retreat-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.zionviewella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 21, 'count2': 32, 'count3': 83, 'count4': 239, 'count5': 583}}
text:
This hotel was perfectly located for access to the main town of Ella, with easy access to both the Little Adams peak and Ella rock trails. The rooms were all well appointed and had their own little outside seating area with a hammock. It also looked like all the rooms had views to die for! The hotel doesn't try to be swanky, it's just a nice honest hotel that does the basics really well.

The staff were all really attentive and friendly.

The hotel offers twice daily yoga sessions for a small fee, these were run by a really great instructor and we really enjoyed them.
title: Perfectly located and well run hotel, and super views

placeInfo: {'id': '1236751', 'name': 'Zion View Ella Green Retreat', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.87216, 'longitude': 81.04709, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1236751-Reviews-Zion_View_Ella_Green_Retreat-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.zionviewella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 21, 'count2': 32, 'count3': 83, 'count4': 239, 'count5': 583}}
text: Lovely hotel located in the heart of Ella and just 5 minutes walk from the  bars and restaurants. The rooms are basic but clean and comfortable but the balcony is great with fantastic views. You could sit there for hours admiring the view and watching the wildlife. We had plenty of hot water with good water pressure. The breakfast was varied and plentiful and included both Sri Lankan and European options. The staff at the hotel were amazing and super helpful, they would do anything to make your stay more enjoyable. The only slight downside of the hotel is the fact that you have to descend several steps to get to the front desk, dinning area and rooms, and this may present a problem for this with mobility issues.
title: Great service and amazing views

roomTip: View from room 1 was superb
text:
Stayed here for 2 nights on our Sri Lanka trip. The hotel is great and we would recommend. Especially with a small child.

Positive:
- friendly service, great massage
- great children play area
- fantastic views
- great breakfast

Neutral:
- the room 1 was small and the bathroom very small. Worked for us, but might not suit everyone
- not cheap, but this is probably valid for most of Ella

Tip: view from room 1 was superb
title: Perfect place as a family with a little one

placeInfo: {'id': '1236751', 'name': 'Zion View Ella Green Retreat', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.87216, 'longitude': 81.04709, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1236751-Reviews-Zion_View_Ella_Green_Retreat-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.zionviewella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 21, 'count2': 32, 'count3': 83, 'count4': 239, 'count5': 583}}
text: Zion Views - just WOW!  The view itself was just breathtaking.  We had to leave our tour bus and tuk tuk up the hill to this hotel as the road is very steep and narrow.  The tuk tuk ride was an adventure to say the least.  Once we arrived it was evening and the mist just took over the hotel.  We ate in the mist and it felt mystical and magical.  We had an apartment with three bedrooms and it was just awesome!  Timber floors and a massive loungeroom and comfy beds, a kitchen and dining area and a massive patio/balcony with hammocks and swinging chairs overlooking the valley.  The apartment was very clean.  The staff were accommodating with our party mood in our luxurous apartment and kept running drinks down for us.  In the morning we well and truly were surprised - the mist had cleared and the views were stunning.  The hotel made a birthday cake for our birthday girl for breakfast and we just couldn't get enough of the views whilst eating.  Once again we wished we could of stayed longer at yet another beautiful venue/retreat.  Thank you staff of Zion View.
title: Mystical or Mistical - Amazing Retreat

text: There is no disputing this hotel is in an amazing spot, the view is simply spectacular. Rooms are clean and comfortable and the pool is lovely.  Breakfast is very good, recommend the omelettes! The only drawback is that you have to walk up an extremely steep hill to get to it and then there are multiple steps within the hotel itself to get to your rooms. text: What a wonderful hotel. Beautiful views, comfortable rooms, a pool, fabulous food and the most delightful, warm and welcoming staff. I arrived on my birthday and opened my room to find balloons, a birthday banner and a cake - really lovely gesture. Ella itself is a delight - a laid back traveller’s town surrounded by high peaks. Great hiking and loads of options for eating out. Highly recommend this hotel
title: Stay here if you are in Ella

text:
We stayed 2 nights with 2 young kids . The view is amazing .. as most accommodation in ella are , it's uphill. They have very nice play corner for kids with sand and toys .. our kids also found some company and had great time. Swimming pool is lovely too. 

Breakfast is good.. lots of eco initiatives in the small things which is rare to see in big hotels . Only complain was towels did not smell fresh. Other than that we really enjoyed our stay.

text: Lovely stay at the Zion hotel! The staff were so friendly and couldn’t do enough for us, especially the hotel manager and the reception staff. The chefs at breakfast were lovely too, as was the delicious food. The views from this hotel are insane!! A very special place. Great location (2 mins up the hill from Ella town), and close to all the main sights. Rooms are basic but clean and comfortable. We also did the yoga and a massage here (extra charge but good price) which were both enjoyed! Would highly recommend!
title: Amazing place!

placeInfo: {'id': '1236751', 'name': 'Zion View Ella Green Retreat', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 958, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.87216, 'longitude': 81.04709, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d1236751-Reviews-Zion_View_Ella_Green_Retreat-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.zionviewella.com/', 'address': 'Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Waterfall Rd', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 21, 'count2': 32, 'count3': 83, 'count4': 239, 'count5': 583}}
text:
I can’t put into words the beauty of the view. Opening my curtains to see the sunrise & Ella rock and hearing the distant temple sound is an experience I won’t forget.
We booked direct with the hotel and they were quick to answer queries I had. The reception staff were helpful - advising us on best routes to take for a couple of walks we did.
The rooftop yoga with Claudia was excellent & a highlight of our time in Sri Lanka - we loved her teaching so much we attended 2 classes a day while we were there. 
We also had a couple of massage treatments which were really good & the best I had in Sri Lanka.
The breakfast buffet was lovely - an ideal mix of Sri Lankan & continental - hoppers were a highlight, as was the tea where you could choose to add things like cinnamon, ginger & mint. 
Highly recommend this beautiful hotel.
title: Unforgettable

roomTip: Many, many steps not suitable if you have a physical disability
text:
Beautiful location close to Ella main street. 
Sadly it rained heavily during our 3 day stay so this may reflect our review as we wee unable to make the most of the location, beautiful views etc. 
We had a 3 bedroom apartment perfect to share with grown up children. Huge kitchen but only stocked with tea and coffee making facilities. Breakfast was good lots of choice and local produce. Staff very helpful. 
There are many steps throughout and it can get slippy when wet.
title: Nice location close to town centre

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text: Good hotel and location, the view from the top floor and infinity pool is amazing. Staff very friendly and very close to the station. Room was clean and good size. The shuttle up and down the hill is fantastic and the breakfast was fresh. The communication between me and the hotel was good and check in was simple.
title: Short stay

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text: What a steep hill to get up to the hotel! Even the Tuc Tucs would only take one person at a time or if they took two, then one had to get out half way up and walk the rest of the hill! We were not happy with our first bedroom as the toilet was so small and we are not small people, and the views from both windows were looking out to a building site and the other a large tree, so no view. We were transferred into another room, not great either but had large shower and toilet much bigger, as for the view it looked over the car park! Sometimes I think when you are in a small group they tend to just shove you into any room?? This was our only complaint. Dining room lovely as was the food. We were initially asked to complete an order form for breakfast and duly submitted it but next morning it was a buffet, so they must have changed their minds?? Room was clean and staff very friendly. The pool on the roof was cold but great to have a swim with a view. The little bar and dining area on the rooftop was lovely and we enjoyed the cocktails and dinner. I would recommend it but would want to make sure that I got a room with a view?
title: Really good hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text:
I recently made a reservation directly on this hotel’s website and received an on-screen confirmation, which reassured me that my booking was secure. However, the following day, I received an email stating that my reservation had been canceled with no explanation or apology.

Reaching out to the hotel for clarification proved challenging, and when I finally connected with someone, I was simply told that the hotel was fully booked on my selected date—again, without any apology or acknowledgment of the inconvenience.

I’m disappointed by the lack of customer care and communication. For a hotel of this caliber, I expected more transparency and courtesy when handling guest reservations. I would caution others considering booking here, as similar issues could easily disrupt their plans as it did mine.
title: Disappointing Customer Service and Lack of Communication

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text:
We booked this place for our first stop on the Honeymoon. On the week of the wedding and 5 days before we were supposed to stay at the Hotel, we got a message saying they were doing some renovation so that our room was no longer available. This meant we had to spend nearly double the price last minute in order to find another hotel.

It might be a nice hotel, but the customer service and way they told us our room was no longer available was horrendous. I would not recommend due to the fact it seems like they are happy to cancel your booking with less than a week's notice.
title: Honeymoon trip ruined

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text: Absolutely loved this hotel. It is at the top of a very steep road and when you get to the top you realise why. The views are outstanding. The rooftop pool whilst a bit chilly has views to die for. The rooms are spacious and very comfortable and the breakfast is great. Only 4 rather than 5 as service at dinner was extremely slow but it did not detract from an otherwise wonderful stay.
title: Beautiful boutique hotel

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text: We had an amazing stay here in Ella at the Morning Dew. Lovely staff that are always ready to help, very good food and cocktails, clean and comfortable rooms and a stunning view and rooftop swimming pool. We were here for 3 night, but wished we could stay here longer. placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
roomTip: Keep in mind there is a steep hill so come when the shuttle is still active especially if carrying Luggage .You can ring them on WhatsApp .( I got a sim at the airport )
text:
Hotel no .3 on our trip and it did not leave us down .Friendly helpful staff ,lovely views ,they will shuttle you up and down the hill until 6pm .Good base to explore the area .Happy with the restaurant food and drinks at the hotel .I am glad we stayed here and would have no hesitation recommending it .
Thanks to our driver Dushan Theekshana (+ 94 77 942 6347 Whatsapp ) for all he is doing for us, bringing us around this wonderful country
title: Perfect Base in Ella

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
roomTip: Rains from time to time in Ella
text:
Everything as advertised, very good value for money.
Staff is 6/5. So nice and welcoming. 
Rooms clean, views great.
The road up to the hotel is very steep, but the hotel will drive you up and down on your request.
Located 3 min walk from everything in the city centre, but far enough that most of the buzz from the centre doesn’t reach your room.
title: Welcoming clean good views

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text: Absolutely stunning hotel - impeccable service from all staff, especially in the restaurant! - of which serves up some great sri lankan classics along with many other choices. drinks were on 241 from 6pm-8pm! :) The views from this hotel are incredible, from in the shower to the rooftop pool; you are able to see Ella Rock. Room was spacious, bed was comfortable and shower worked well. Spotlessly clean everywhere. The only small inconvenience is the hotel is located on a steep hill (which is to be expected given the views) however the hotel kindly offered to pick us up from the train station and as long as you have no knee problems, it is fine to walk up and down. Location was perfect, close to restaurants, bars and shops
title: Perfect stay

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
roomTip: The sunrise and sunset from the Level 5 360 degree viewing platform are incredible - a must see.
text: An incredible hotel. The staff are so friendly and the view is the best in Ella. Rooms are modern, recently renovated, impeccably clean. placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text: We had a wonderful visit at the Morning Dew Hotel on the day of Vesak Celebrations in May 2024. Prior to arrival, we had very good communication via WhatsApp with the manager and reception about some questions we had. Their online service was really so nice, quick, and courteous! And when our train to Ella was late, they sent us the dinner menu via WhatsApp (we had a half-board reservation) so that we could order our meals on beforehand. They figured we were probably tired and needed food. How thoughtful! They have transportation to and from the railway station and other nearby locations, which is very practical, since the road up to the hotel is quite steep. Two of us had a really great back, shoulder, and neck massage in the morning from a very kind and thoroughly competent masseur. The food, both for dinner and breakfast, was delicious and plentiful. When my wife decided to withdraw early from dinner, they offered to bring her a fruit platter to her room -- which she truly appreciated. The rooftop terrace and pool are exquisite, with a lovely view both day and night. In short: We truly enjoyed our stay and can recommend warmly! (One thing: the terraces/balconies, from what we could see, are not really child-proofed, since some of the railings are relatively low. So, just keep that in mind. The service is very family-friendly, though.)
title: Truly great experience

title: Great hotel and staff

ownerResponse:
{'id': '951151932', 'text': 'Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you very much for leaving such a wonderful feedback for us.

We pleased that you have utilized and enjoyed the services & facilities of our hotel.

As per the hotel policy, we used to take an advance payment before going to block the room and after arrival we used to take the balance payment for the safety purpose. In addition, the Central Bank of Sri Lanka has a floating exchange rate on a daily basis where they are calculating different taxes which are bare to us. So, we used to advise the government sector to do the foreign transactions plus taxes, due to that we need to collect payment with taxes, which is a NON profitable process. Moreover, we had explained to you with regards and you also agreed to pay.

 We look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you back on your future visits.

Ayubowan (May you live long)

Yours Sincerely

Manager', 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-05-17', 'responder': None, 'connectionToSubject': None}
placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text:
Was asked to pay in advance for this hotel and told that couldn’t pay on arrival. As based in UK my bank charged a currency conversion fee to send payment in USD. 

When I arrived they asked for a 5,500 LKR payment (c. $18), which apparently was to cover their currency conversion costs. This meant I paid for their foreign exchange, despite it being them who insisted on advance payment.

Forex risk should be a consideration as part of running their commercial enterprise, and not borne by the guest as an extra charge on arrival. Very disappointing. Especially as if I paid on arrival, this could have been avoided completely.

Staff were attentive, friendly, and always willing to help. Room was clean and sizeable, and bed was really comfy. Plus great views.
title: Hidden charges on arrival

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text: A very well-appointed boutique hotel with friendly and attentive staff. Views are incredible (worth the steep road up from the main street - thank goodness for the shuttle provided by the hotel) and the pool is divine. Our room was very comfortable and spacious with views from two sides, including from the shower! Breakfast and dinner were both delicious (the yellowfin tuna was perfect). Ishara, the food and beverage manager, was very respectful and professional. He ensured that we were satisfied with what we had ordered, and loved to chat about Sri Lanka and our country - New Zealand. We would would highly recommend that you stay here when you’re visiting Ella.
title: Highly recommend staying here!

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
roomTip: Very steep and winding hill, okay for cars, yuk-tuks not so much. Walkable but would be challenging with suitcases.
text: Beautiful location for views but access can be challenging. Others have written (in other reviews0 about the steep road climb to the hotel. It is true. It is walkable but three tuk-tuks refused to take us back after dinner. There is a shuttle from the hotel but it stops at 6:00pm. The hotel assured us that we could easily get a tuk-tuk back to the hotel after 6:00 but for us, this was not the case. Poor and inconsistent Wi-Fi connection; we had to stand by the door of our room to get a signal. Elevator very small (two pax plus two bags max) and very slow. We went to breakfast at 8:30 and the buffet was virtually empty and picked over. Certainly not excellent food, nor plentiful. The ‘hopper’ was as shown in pic, and burnt. Others have said it is noisy, but we did not find this was so. The pool few is spectacular, but the water was murky and not clean and we chose not to swim.  There is a gap in the screening and children should not be unsupervised poolside. This hotel is fair at best. Staff are very welcoming.
title: Fair at best, certainly not excellent.

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text:
We have just spent 3 wonderful nights at the Mountain Dew Hotel. We arrived in torrential rain, but that did not dampen the initial impression of the hotel as you could still see the amazing 360-degree views of the mountains Ella Rock, Little Adams Peak and others. The room was very comfortable and we had wonderful views from the shower. The staff at the hotel are so friendly and always made you feel welcome. The rooftop pool with amazing views was also a blessing after hiking up the mountains. For the cost, this hotel is definitely worth 5 stars, and any faults other reviewers have found are generally knit picking.
I wish we had stayed longer than the 3 nights we booked as Ella is lovely and the hotel was the icing on the cake
title: 3 Night Stay in Ella

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text: The welcome drink is served on the top floor overlooking the hills of Ella. Impressive ! Good kitchen and helpfull staff. The hotel is situated on a steep hill but a shuttle is provided on request. Ideal foor the older travellers ! We were very satisfied .

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text: It is a really nice hotel with a fantastic view. The staff was very friendly and professional. However there were some small details, we came across. The rooms are clean but a little bit musty due to the high humidity. The last 200m to the hotel are really steep, so you really have to be careful. But all in all a good place to stay in Ella.

text: We made a non refundable booking through booking.com 6 months before our trip. At 12.30pm on the day of our arrival the hotel cancelled our booking. We were already in Ella so went to the hotel. They had a problem with the water supply to 3 rooms but none were the class of room we had reserved. When I pointed this out they told is that we had been reallocated to one of the rooms that could not be used. When pressed both the General Manager and the Reservations Manager stated that other guests were paying more. I did try to get the police to come to the hotel but of course they were not interested. I have never known any hotel to act in this way so for a 4 star hotel to do this is appalling.
title: Disgraceful behaviour

roomTip: Take a tuk tuk or ask for the hotel van. Road to the hotel is very steep & narrow.
text: We stayed one night @ Morning Dew Boutique Hotel. The drive to the hotel is accessible only by tuk tuk or the hotel van for which they have timings....very very steep & narrow. It is walkable distance to the restaurants & shopping street. The view from the terrace & swimming pool is stunning...overlooking Little Adam's Peak & the mountains. The breakfast was delicious...lovely spread of Continental & Sri Lankan fare. The room & bathing area was very nice. Good choice in Ella.
title: Great view from the terrace

text:
Very happy with our stay. Lovely staff, fantastic views from the room. AC worked nicely & hot shower.
Reason for not giving the 5/5, few small ants in the bathroom and breakfast was good,  but not brilliant. Loud music from cafe chill was a bit irritating…but you would get that anywhere in Ella I guess. 
Would absolutely recommend. Also the hill was not that bad at all!

placeInfo: {'id': '8431243', 'name': 'Morning Dew Boutique Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 444, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.873068, 'longitude': 81.04741, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d8431243-Reviews-Morning_Dew_Boutique_Hotel-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.morningdewboutiquehotel.com/', 'address': 'Wamullahena, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Wamullahena', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 29, 'count2': 10, 'count3': 32, 'count4': 119, 'count5': 254}}
text:
Stayed recently 2 nights as a couple and left feeling disappointed. Nothing massively wrong and we had decent sleeps but the hotel just felt a bit tired and lacking anything. 

- lots of flies in around the room and reception with no citronella or incense to stop them
- small spiders/ants on furniture and kettle area including in cups and on cutlery in room. 
- the hotel constantly lost power and whilst majority of times it came back on within a minute it also did take longer sometimes and you were left with no power or lights 
- loud music until late at night. After midnight. Not sure if from rooftop or neighbouring property 
- no staff in reception overnight with front door wide open. We would get up for sunrise hikes etc and security felt slightly lacking around entrance area.
-  the reviews mention steep hill to the hotel but it really is very steep. Need to be careful walking down if it has been raining and some drivers won’t be able to make it up. 
- nice rooftop pool but towels are old and dirty
- great views from rooftop bar and seating area. The bar itself felt tired though with loud club music playing in middle of the day.
- good laundry service although had to chase multiple times for it to be delivered
- rooms just felt a little tired overall but bed pretty comfortable.

Nothing dramatically wrong but came away not overly impressed and nothing memorable.
title: Fine but areas to improve….

roomTip: Dont try to pull your luggage to the hotel, get a tuk tuk or taxi.
text:
Wow, what a view from this lovely hotel perched above Ella. However, the access road is also somthing else. Very steep and narrow but worth the effort. The hotel has 5 floors, the 5th being the amazing pool on a roof top with stunning views. Staff are lovely and very enthusistic about their job. It is obvious they have pride in their hotel. Our room had two balconies, one at each end to get views from both sides. The rooms are well appointed with room to spare. Strongly recommend you get up for the sunrise, viewed from the 4th and 5th floors. The breakfast was nicely thought out. Not large but the choices were varied. 
Ella town is within easy walking distance, although of course, you do need to walk up and down the steep access road. We recommend this hotel.
title: Fabulous location, once you get there.

placeInfo: {'id': '2137752', 'name': 'Green Hill', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 409, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.870061, 'longitude': 81.051765, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d2137752-Reviews-Green_Hill-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/greenhillella/', 'address': 'Passara Road Sapumalthanna, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Passara Road', 'street2': 'Sapumalthanna', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 21, 'count2': 19, 'count3': 28, 'count4': 103, 'count5': 238}}
text: The staff at this hotel & the owner were incredibly welcoming and helpful throughout our stay. The rooms were immaculate and very comfortable. We also enjoyed the delicious breakfast each morning & the pizza is amazing.loved the convenient location close to major attractions in ella

placeInfo: {'id': '2137752', 'name': 'Green Hill', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 409, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.870061, 'longitude': 81.051765, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d2137752-Reviews-Green_Hill-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/greenhillella/', 'address': 'Passara Road Sapumalthanna, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Passara Road', 'street2': 'Sapumalthanna', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 21, 'count2': 19, 'count3': 28, 'count4': 103, 'count5': 238}}
text: Staying at the hotel was an absolute delight! The view was breathtaking, offering a serene panorama that included iconic landmarks like Ella Rock and Ravana Pool Club etc. It was like having the best of the area right at my fingertips. The staff were incredibly kind and attentive, ensuring that every aspect of my stay was comfortable and enjoyable. Special thanks to the front office lady whose assistance made traveling a breeze, ensuring I could explore the area with ease. The hotel's facilities were top-notch, enhancing the overall experience and making it a memorable stay. I can't wait to return and relive the wonderful moments at this incredible hotel.
title: Enchanting Views and Exceptional Hospitality of my stay in Green Hill Ella

placeInfo: {'id': '2137752', 'name': 'Green Hill', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 409, 'locationString': 'Ella, Uva Province', 'latitude': 6.870061, 'longitude': 81.051765, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g616035-d2137752-Reviews-Green_Hill-Ella_Uva_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/greenhillella/', 'address': 'Passara Road Sapumalthanna, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Passara Road', 'street2': 'Sapumalthanna', 'city': 'Ella', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '90090'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 21, 'count2': 19, 'count3': 28, 'count4': 103, 'count5': 238}}
text: Beautiful spot for breakfast and relaxing with views in Ella. It is about a 10 minute walk from the center of town and 15 minutes to the train station. The rooms were clean and spacious. The staff was also very helpful. Sonny always made sure I had everything I needed and Kavindu even helped me when I had leech bites from my hike! Would recommend for a beautiful place to stay.
title: Beautiful views and a wonderful stay

text: An indescribably beautiful view from one of the highest mountains in Ella. Very nice team with a special breakfast high up in the mountains. The team also organizes great excursions such as a visit to the tea plantations without any problems. We can highly recommend it.
title: Incredible view in Ella
